channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Timing on signals is wrong, 25th June
item.description:
20 cars allowed in Cheltenham direction, 10+ out of Staverton Village/Hazelwoods and then only enough time for 3 cars in Gloucester direction. Caused long tail back on old Glos road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Pothole in carriageway, 25th June
item.description:
Pothole in carriageway affecting nearside tyres. It's close to the petrol station and hard to avoid as there are parked cars on the other side of the road. Might be a blocked drain. Has been there for ages.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Farmer has ploughed over 3 footpaths, 25th June
item.description:
The three footpaths stemming from my pin on the map have been ploughed by the farmer with no attempt to flatten or avoid them. There is no alternative that follows these paths. This occurred approx 3.5 weeks ago and no attempt to restore the paths have been undertaken. On one walk an elderly couple asked me if it has been ploughed all the way as they were unsure if they would be steady enough on their feet to walk it. My pregnant wife is also unable to walk these paths now. People are being denied their ancient right of access to the countryside

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocking visibility on road/junction (Grass/verge) problem, 25th June
item.description:
previous job 42526939 has been completed near section (east side of road) but not on junction for cars to come out of on west side causing blind spot for cars trying to leave properties. previous ref 11458292 - 11460120.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 25th June
item.description:
Customer states that STW looked at this drain today 25/06/2024 - they have stated that this is a collapsed storm drain and an Highways issue.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green traffic light inop., 25th June
item.description:
Located at NW corner of junction Fairview Road and Winchcombe Street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78;80, Winchcombe Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 25th June
item.description:
